table.name: civicrm_custom_group
table.comment: All extended (custom) properties are associated with a group. These are logical sets of related data.

field.name: id
field.comment: Unique Custom Group ID

field.name: name
field.comment: Variable name/programmatic handle for this group.

field.name: title
field.comment: Friendly Name.

field.name: extends
field.comment: Type of object this group extends (can add other options later e.g. contact_address, etc.).

field.name: extends_entity_column_name
field.comment: linking custom group for dynamic object

field.name: extends_entity_column_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.id (for option group custom_data_type.)

field.name: extends_entity_column_value
field.comment: linking custom group for dynamic object

field.name: style
field.comment: Visual relationship between this form and its parent.

field.name: collapse_display
field.comment: Will this group be in collapsed or expanded mode on initial display ?

field.name: help_pre
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display before fields in form.

field.name: help_post
field.comment: Description and/or help text to display after fields in form.

field.name: weight
field.comment: Controls display order when multiple extended property groups are setup for the same class.

field.name: is_active
field.comment: Is this property active?

field.name: table_name
field.comment: Name of the table that holds the values for this group.

field.name: is_multiple
field.comment: Does this group hold multiple values?

field.name: min_multiple
field.comment: minimum number of multiple records (typically 0?)

field.name: max_multiple
field.comment: maximum number of multiple records, if 0 - no max

field.name: collapse_adv_display
field.comment: Will this group be in collapsed or expanded mode on advanced search display ?

field.name: created_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_contact, who created this custom group

field.name: created_date
field.title: Custom Group Created Date
field.comment: Date and time this custom group was created.

field.name: is_reserved
field.comment: Is this a reserved Custom Group?
